subject: Fw: Thank you for your refinance application, we are ready to give a loan
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$327,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://lovuikeisowcost.com/
